title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Santa Rosa, California
content:
Photo submitted by Jann Mayer, “This was along Ridge Trail in Trione-Annadel State Park, Santa Rosa, CA. Beautiful fall day!” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Santa Rosa, California appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
